imdb.plot outline: This fall, Experticity gave two Experts a wild adventure around the Zion National Park area. After receiving 1,300 applications submitted from Experts who wanted to participate, we invited Drew - a Ski and Mountain Bike Expert - and Rachel - a Climbing and Canyoneering Expert - down to the deserts of Utah to test out some gear and share their expertise with each other.
imdb.title: Adventure Box
plot: This fall, Experticity gave two Experts a wild adventure around the Zion National Park area. After receiving 1,300 applications submitted from Experts who wanted to participate, we invited Drew - a Ski and Mountain Bike Expert - and Rachel - a Climbing and Canyoneering Expert - down to the deserts of Utah to test out some gear and share their expertise with each other.
